subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Science
subdisciplines.description: The interdisciplinary study of the human mind and its processes, including perception, attention, learning, and memory.

subdisciplines.name: User Experience Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing digital products, websites, and applications to be user-friendly, efficient, and enjoyable to use.

subdisciplines.name: Information Architecture
subdisciplines.description: The practice of organizing and structuring content and information in a way that makes it easy for users to find and navigate.

subdisciplines.name: Interaction Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing interactive products, services, and systems that are easy, efficient, and enjoyable to use.

subdisciplines.name: User Interface Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing the visual and interactive elements of digital products, including icons, buttons, and layouts.
